p: All patients indicated a fear of the test results and reported fear, particularly of CT assessments and viral nucleic acid tests. The patients feared a diagnosis of COVID-19 during the early stages and feared that their condition would deteriorate. Concerns that the viral nucleic acid tests would not become negative during middle or later stages. Concern over the delay or prevention of discharge was also expressed. P11: "I basically ask for my test results every time I see a nurse and doctor but they are not ready, I think, what if they are positive?" P1: "I feel the period before the diagnosis is the hardest and every day I dread the results. When the doctor told me the results, I felt my heart in my throat (heart palpitations).‚Äù
